title: Enhancing neutral hydrogen production by disrupting the rigid hydrogen bond network on Ru nanoclusters through Nb2O5-mediated water reorientation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01855A, Paper
Xiao Hui Chen, Xiao Lin Li, Ting Li, Jia Huan Jia, Jing Lei Lei, Nian Bing Li, Hong Qun Luo
Nb2O5 with a negative charge can disrupt the rigid H-bond network on the surface of Ru nanoclusters, making it easier for free water molecules to reach the catalyst, thus accelerating the reactivity of hydrogen reduction.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
